title: Client not working?  RESTART or SHUTDOWN options when opening.
body:

replies.body: Mines fixed now. Think yours should be ok too.
Yeah seems to have come back. Seems to be an issue connecting to https://l3cdn.riotgames.com/ - I get a cert error when I go there via my browser tho
